# ACLUserDefinedLogs

Logs related to User Defined Functions and User Defined Endpoints.

|Attribute|Value|

|**Resource types**|microsoft.confidentialledger/ledgers|
|**Categories**|Azure Resources, Audit, Applications|
|**Solutions**| LogManagement|
|**Basic log**|Yes|
